QuestData.Title: Treasure Contract: The Thunderlord Sage
QuestData.Description:
In Frostfire Ridge, a Thunderlord sage by the name of Argoram seems to have uncovered the whereabouts of a storied weapon, known to the orcs as Gronnsbane.
He was last spotted headed into Magnarok. Find him and see if he can lead you to this relic.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate the Thunderlord sage Argoram in Magnarok.
